### lx-checkbox
```javascript
{
  'key': 'modelName',
  'type': 'lx-checkbox'
  'templateOptions': {
  'label': 'A checkbox label',
    'description': 'A checkbox help description,
    'disabled': false, // ng-disabled
    'checked': false // ng-checked
  }
}
```
Read more about [LumX checkboxes](http://ui.lumapps.com/css/checkboxes).
